mapper.insert: insert into museum(museum_name, description, address, website_url, booking_url, create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{museumName}, #{description}, #{address}, #{websiteUrl}, #{bookingUrl},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select museum_id, museum_name, description, address, website_url, booking_url, create_time, update_time from museum
and museum_id = #{museumId} and museum_name like concat('%', #{museumName}, '%') and address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
order by museum_id asc
